page.title: 05HUNTS FOUNDRY,EARLS COLNE
page.content: {R.Hunt}and Co.Ltd are Agricultural suppliers and they were started over a hundred years ago by the grandfather of the late director. All Hunts products are now known all over the world.{Mr Robert Hunt}whose father was a millwright at Cambridgeshire,left home to travel though Essex to repair windmills and watermills. After completing some work at Earls Colne he settled here and started business on the very site upon which the Atlas work now stands. He was subsequently in partnership with his sons, Thomas, Robert and Ruben who carried on the firm after his death in 1855. After Thomas and Robert had died the business was passed to the younger son Ruben, who, at the age 21, became sole owner.
